text: Gustavo Biosca Pagés (29 February 1928 – 1 November 2014) was a Spanish football player and manager. ==Career== Born in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Barcelona, Catalonia, Biosca played as a defender for España Industrial, Barcelona and Condal. He made his international debut for Spain in 1951, earning a total of 11 caps, including 2 in FIFA World Cup qualifying matches. As a coach, he managed Pontevedra, Sant Andreu, Real Valladolid, Sabadell, the Spanish under-21 national team and Terrassa. ==Later life and death== Biosca died on 1 November 2014, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from L'Hospitalet de Llobregat Category:Spanish footballers Category:Footballers from Barcelona Category:Catalan footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:La Liga players Category:Segunda División players Category:FC Barcelona players Category:CD Condal players Category:Spain B international footballers Category:Spain international footballers Category:Spanish football managers Category:Pontevedra CF managers Category:UE Sant Andreu managers Category:Real Valladolid managers Category:CE Sabadell FC managers Category:Spain national under-21 football team managers Category:Terrassa FC managers
title: Gustau Biosca
